entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Humboldt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:06 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pilger 08:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -16.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -18.7°C
Wind: E 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this morning then becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
